attributes.action: Go back to weekly bin collection instead of fortnightly
attributes.background: Bins were collected in the past on weekly basis but suddenly it is changed into fortnightly. Street and house fronts are now less tidy than before. Rubbish is piling up in front door of many houses. We belive we pay enough council tax to keep our streets clean and bins get collected weekly.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about your local bin collections are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could start a new petition asking for all councils to be required by law to offer weekly bin collections.
